simplified_sentence: NASA is trying to track smaller asteroids that are 140 meters wide or bigger. There are about 25,000 of these asteroids, but only 8,000 have been tracked so far. This means 17,000 are still not tracked. In 2013, a 19-meter asteroid exploded over Chelyabinsk in Russia and hurt 1,200 people. So, these middle-sized asteroids could be very dangerous if they come close to Earth.

NASA is now trying to track smaller asteroids that are 140 meters wide or more. There are about 25,000 of these asteroids, but so far, only around 8,000 have been tracked, which means 17,000 are still unknown. A 19-meter asteroid exploded over Chelyabinsk in Russia in 2013 and injured 1,200 people. This shows that these medium-sized asteroids could be very dangerous if they come close to Earth.

Earthquakes can damage buildings and bridges. However, bridges do not often fall down, especially new ones. Engineers know how to build bridges in places where earthquakes happen, using stronger materials.

Earthquakes can damage all buildings, including bridges. Fortunately, bridge collapses are not very common, especially with new bridges. Engineers know how to design bridges in places where earthquakes happen, using materials that can better handle movement.

The Hunger Games happen every year. The Capitol uses them to show the districts that they are being punished for fighting back. Each year, one boy and one girl aged 12 to 18 are picked from each district to fight in a battle where only one can live. The chosen teenagers are called "tributes." Everyone in the country has to watch the event on TV.

The Hunger Games are a yearly event that the Capitol uses to show the districts they are being punished for rebelling. Each year, one boy and one girl aged 12 to 18 are picked from each district by lottery to fight in a battle where only one person can survive. The chosen teenagers are called "tributes." Everyone in the country has to watch the event on television.

Small animals like birds, squirrels, mice, and insects are often seen in cities and towns. Recently, there have been many news stories about wild animals coming into cities more and more. There have been bears in parks in Vancouver, leopards on the streets in Mumbai, and wild pigs in gardens in Berlin. What happens when bigger animals come into our cities? Do people welcome them, or do they see them as a danger or a problem?

Small animals like birds, squirrels, mice, and insects are often seen in cities and towns. Recently, there have been many news stories about wild animals entering cities in larger numbers. For example, bears have been spotted in parks in Vancouver, leopards have been seen on the streets of Mumbai, and wild pigs have appeared in gardens in Berlin. What happens when larger animals come into our cities? Are they welcomed, or are they seen as a danger or a problem?

'Potentially Hazardous Asteroids' are rocks that come close to Earth's orbit, within 7.5 million kilometers. NASA has made a map of 1,400 of these asteroids, and none are expected to be a danger in the next hundred years. With current technology, NASA can watch these objects and predict if they might hit Earth. If needed, two ways to protect us can be used.

Potentially Hazardous Asteroids are rocks that come close to Earth's orbit, within 7.5 million kilometers. NASA has made a map of 1,400 of these asteroids, and none are expected to be a danger in the next hundred years. Using current technology, NASA can track these objects and predict if they might hit Earth. If needed, two defense solutions could be used.

One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins was changing TV channels. It was during the US invasion of Iraq. The only shows she found were reality shows with young people trying to win a million dollars and news about the war. Suzanne thought these two things mixed together in a strange way, and that is how she got the idea for The Hunger Games.

One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins was changing channels on TV. It was during the US invasion of Iraq. The only shows she could find were reality shows with young people trying to win a million dollars and news about the war. Suzanne felt that these two things mixed together in a strange way, and that’s when she got the idea for The Hunger Games.

The Life of Pi is a special story about a boy named Pi from India. He is a teenager who is on a ship that sinks. He ends up in a small boat in the Pacific Ocean with a fierce tiger. This book is the third one by Canadian writer Yann Martel and came out in 2001. Since then, it has sold more than seven million copies around the world, won many awards, and has been translated into 41 languages. Martel grew up in different countries like Costa Rica, Canada, France, and Mexico because his father was a diplomat.

The Life of Pi is an amazing story about a teenage boy named Pi from India. He is shipwrecked and ends up on a lifeboat in the Pacific Ocean with a fierce tiger. This is the third book by Canadian author Yann Martel, published in 2001. Since then, it has sold more than seven million copies around the world, won many awards, and has been translated into 41 languages. Martel grew up in different countries, including Costa Rica, Canada, France, and Mexico, because his father was a diplomat.

Dreams about a phone call from an old friend or the death of someone close are more likely just a coincidence, not a sign of the future. We often forget the times we dream about these things and they do not happen.

Dreams about getting a call from an old friend or the death of someone we care about are more likely just coincidences than predictions. We also tend to forget the many times we dream about these things and they don’t happen.

Some bridge collapses are a mystery, and engineers find out why only after a full investigation. Sometimes, this happens because bad materials were used to build the bridge, or because a key part of the bridge was faulty. Other times, the bridge was made to hold only a certain amount of weight.

Some bridge collapses are mysteries, and engineers only find out why after a full investigation. Sometimes, this happens because poor-quality materials were used in building the bridge, or because a key part of the bridge was faulty. In other cases, the bridge was designed to hold only a specific amount of weight and not more.

I used to work five days a week, but after my parental leave, I wanted to spend more time with my children before they start school. I talked to my boss, and we agreed that I would work three days a week. This also meant I would earn less money. However, I have noticed that my work is still the same as before! Now, I do five days of work in just three days, but I get paid much less for it!

I used to work five days a week, but after my parental leave, I wanted to spend more time with my children before they start school. After talking with my boss, we agreed to change my work week to three days. This also meant I would earn less money because I am paid based on the number of days I work. However, I have noticed that my workload has not decreased at all! Now, I am doing the same amount of work as before in just three days, but I am getting paid much less for it!

Today, many businesses work with people from different countries. Most people use English to communicate, but the way they talk and expect things can be very different depending on their culture. Not knowing these cultural differences can lead to misunderstandings and problems in communication. Here are three important areas of business etiquette around the world that can help you when working with someone from a different culture.

Today, many businesses work internationally. Most people in global business use English, but the way they communicate can be very different depending on their culture. Not knowing the cultural rules and practices of others can lead to misunderstandings and problems in communication. Here are three important areas of business etiquette around the world that can help you when working with someone from a different culture.

Between 100,000 and 50,000 years ago, we see signs of early human civilization, like cave paintings. We don't know how this relates to language. Brains didn't get bigger suddenly, but humans became more complex and smarter. Did using language help their brains grow? Or did their smarter brains help them create language?

Between 100,000 and 50,000 years ago, we see signs of early human civilization, like cave paintings. We don't know how this relates to language. Brains didn't suddenly grow larger, but humans became more complex and smarter. Did using language help their brains develop? Or did their more complex brains lead to the creation of language?

Many big supermarket chains have faced criticism for doing bad things in the last ten years. They have wasted a lot of food, paid their suppliers too little, and created too much plastic waste in their packaging, which harms the environment. But now, supermarkets are starting to pay attention. Because many customers are unhappy about the plastic waste, some of the largest supermarkets in the UK have agreed to a plan to change their packaging and reduce plastic waste.

Many big supermarket chains have faced criticism for being unethical in the last ten years. However, supermarkets are beginning to pay attention. In response to customers' concerns about plastic waste, some of the largest supermarkets in the UK have agreed to a plan to change their packaging and reduce plastic waste.

Wasfia Nazreen saw a hula hoop for the first time when she was a young girl in Bangladesh. A foreign child was playing with it, and Wasfia watched but did not join in because girls in her country were not allowed to play with hula hoops or ride bikes. Now, Wasfia has climbed the Seven Summits, including Everest and Kilimanjaro. She is the first person to hula hoop on each mountain. She does this to help women and girls in her country, where they are often discouraged from playing sports.

She watched a foreign child play with it but felt she couldn't join in because girls in her country were not allowed to play with hula hoops or ride bikes. Now, Wasfia is one of the few people in the world who has climbed the Seven Summits, including Everest and Kilimanjaro. She is also the first person to hula hoop on each of these mountains. She does this to inspire women and girls in her country, where they are often discouraged from playing sports.

Based on these findings, we suggest that Girox Foods use a management style that focuses more on people. We should look for ways to offer flexible working hours and allow employees to work from places they choose. Managers need to find different ways to challenge our staff and give more positive feedback and recognition for their work. Spending more on professional development, especially in social and intercultural communication, can help create a better environment for employees to do their best work.

Managers should find different ways to challenge staff and give more positive feedback and recognition for their work. In the last 200 years, better technology and health care helped more children live longer. This caused the population to grow quickly. Big families had many children who grew up and had their own kids. But in the 1960s, more people started using birth control. Now, the average number of babies per woman has gone down from six to about two.

In the last 200 years, better technology and health care helped more children survive to adulthood, leading to a fast increase in population. Large families had even more children who grew up and had their own kids. However, since the 1960s, with more access to birth control, the average number of babies per woman has dropped from six to about two.

Being aware of different expectations and behaviors can help us avoid misunderstandings. However, we must remember that cultural stereotypes can harm good business relationships. While national cultures can influence how we act and think, other factors also play a role, like where we live, the people we spend time with, our age and gender, our work culture, and our personal experiences. We should keep these differences in mind, but not use them to judge everyone from a country.

Being aware of different expectations and behaviors can help us avoid misunderstandings. However, we must remember that cultural stereotypes can harm good business relationships. While national cultures can influence how we act and think, other factors also play a big role. These include where we come from, the communities we belong to, our age and gender, our workplace culture, and our personal experiences. We should keep in mind the possible differences, but we should not use them to label everyone from a certain country.

Unlike many other famous musicians, Springsteen is still making popular music and filling big stadiums in his late 60s. This does not surprise me. He tells important stories about us, and when you listen to Born in the USA, those stories still matter today.

Unlike many other famous musicians, Springsteen is still making popular music that fills big stadiums, even in his late 60s. This doesn't surprise me. He shares important stories about who we are, and when you listen to "Born in the USA," those stories still matter today.

Scientists are asking more questions about how our genes affect our brain and language development. Did some genes change to give us the ability to speak? Researchers found a gene change that happened between 200,000 and 100,000 years ago. This change seems to help with speaking and how our brains control our mouths and faces. Monkeys have a similar gene, but it did not change. We do not know yet how much genes affect language, but one day we might find answers in our DNA.

Julie Wong is a top researcher in Robotics and AI. She has written more than 50 papers in important journals. She often speaks at international conferences and won the Royal Academy Simone Fielding fellowship in 2012. Julie lives with her family in a smart home that she designed.
